attributes.action: 2020 Care Review of Blast Related Brain Injuries in Serving & Military Veterans
attributes.additional_details:
Long term health impact includes encephalopathy, chronic pain, neuro complex care, young dementia's, complex PTS, ARS, mental health, personality changes, memory, depression, suicidal risks.(Not including core self/ social/spiritual/physical/emotional/moral and daily life)

Blast Related Traumatic Brain Injury: Current Concepts and Research Considerations (Journal of Neuroscience) VA/ DOD.
Research Advancing Diagnosis and Treatment of Combat Related Brain and Blast Injuries- DRDC (Canada)
Help for Heroes (UK) 40,000 Complex Care of Wounded Campaign (2019)
attributes.background: Care Review, Action Outcomes/ Objectives - based on personal experiences, medical & research evidence. On the long-term impacts of Blast Related Brain Injuries of Serving Military and Veterans.To include: specialist MDT, screening, treatment, care provision for long-term complex needs and support

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
